1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Singleton content type.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Singleton
6  ( -- * Type
7    CTypeOf (..),
8    getContent,
9  
10    -- * Empty and End
11    CEmpty (..), maybeEmpty, omitEmpty, contMaximum,
12    CEnd (..), contMinimum, 
13  ) where
14
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture             as O
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                 as B
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax               as S
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type            as D
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Message   as Msg
20
21
22-- --------------------------------------------  Type
23
24-- | Classifiable into 'D.Type'.
25class CTypeOf c where
26    -- | Get type of content.
27    typeOf :: c -> D.Type
28
29    -- | Test content is a some type.
30    isA :: O.Test2 c D.Type
31    isA c t = typeOf c == t
32
33-- | Get content which may be aborted.
34getContent :: (CTypeOf c) => O.Test c -> (c -> b) -> B.Ab c -> B.Ab b
35getContent _ _    (Left a) = Left a
36getContent is get (Right c)
37    | is c      = Right $ get c
38    | otherwise = let s = B.mixToFlatString $ B.mixEncode $ typeOf c
39                  in Msg.unmatchType s
40
41
42-- --------------------------------------------  Empty and End
43
44-- | Empty: the minimum content.
45class (CTypeOf c) => CEmpty c where
46    isEmpty     :: c -> Bool
47    empty       :: c
48
49-- | Create empty or non-empty content.
50maybeEmpty :: (CEmpty c) => (a -> c) -> Maybe a -> c
51maybeEmpty f (Just a)   = f a
52maybeEmpty _ (Nothing)  = empty
53
54-- | Cut empty terms.
55omitEmpty :: (CEmpty c) => O.Map [S.Term c]
56omitEmpty = B.omit (isEmpty . snd)
57
58-- | Maximum content of contents list.
59contMaximum :: (Ord c, CEmpty c) => [c] -> c
60contMaximum = B.maximumNull empty
61
62-- | End of everything: the maximum content.
63class (CTypeOf c) => CEnd c where
64    isEnd       :: c -> Bool
65    end         :: c
66
67-- | Minimum content of contents list.
68contMinimum :: (Ord c, CEnd c) => [c] -> c
69contMinimum = B.minimumNull end
70
